title: Private Investigator (Adult PC Game)
description:
In the 90s private had a brief interest in the PC gaming world. Realeasing several (pretty high quality) interactive Hardcore PC games. This is the one i remember most and had hours of fun with it. Private Investigator! A funny platform game Like duke nukem 1 & 2 (for thoose who can remember).

You, the player are a Private Investigator that down on his luck. A new client, a young women enters and wants to hire you - helping to expose her husband in cheating. You wil get several mission to solve and for each mission you wil get a bonus from her wich involves removing clothing,using toys and eventually getting to eff her.

[b]Here is the original synopsis that came in the game's CD cover: "YOU are P.I. Dick Slammer. You'll need all your screwing, fighting, shooting and flying skills in order to catch the Senator fooling around with his girlfriend. If you succeed, his wife will reward you with her body!" I couldn't have summed it up better myself.

Rules of the playthrough:
1. Don't die.
2. Complete all 15 stages.
3. Level of difficulty: Hard.[/b]

Also there is alot of the classic private-magazine bonus material in the game. Like watch porn on the tv in the game and some other stuff.

[u][b]Note:[/b][/u]
Here comes the problem however: The game is ment to play on windows 95/98/maybee XP and i havent been able to set it up correctly on my pc. Im having some issues running this on win xp or win 98 through virtualbox. If someone here knows how to run this please let us know.  :)
